posts.title: Corn Cob Stripper
posts.content: Avoid making a mess next time you eat some corn by using this cob stripper to do the job. It features a ring of stainless steel blades on the inside that quickly strips off all the kernels as you grab onto the plastic exterior and perform a downward pull-twist motion.

posts.title: Calendar Sponge
posts.content: Did you know that dirty sponges are the number one source of bacteria in the household? It’s recommended that you replace a sponge after one month of regular use – so keep track of when each sponge needs replacing with these month displaying sponges.

posts.title: Face Drink Coasters
posts.content: Take on a new persona the next time you go drinking by using these face drink coasters. Each novelty coaster comes imprinted with a distinct face on each side and a special notch at the top so you can place them on your nose and wear them as a mask.

posts.title: Hanging Solar System Mobile
posts.content: Give your little one’s bedroom a stellar touch using this hanging solar system mobile. This scientific and decorative accent comes adorned with beautifully decorated planets that orbit around a sun on a thin frame that creates the illusion they’re floating.

posts.title: Inflatable Rainbow Cloud Bar
posts.content: Turn a day out on the water into a heavenly experience by keeping cold drinks at hand using this inflatable rainbow cloud bar. It boasts large double bed type rapid valves for easy inflation and provides ample space to house ice, bottles, snacks, and up to 5 cups or cans.

posts.title: DIY Robot Building Kit
posts.content: Make robotics fun for your young inventor with this DIY robot building kit. The kit comes with over 600 interlocking parts that snap together and work alongside an app that provides step-by-step instructions on how to construct different models.

posts.title: Space Ghost Action Figure
posts.content: Our favorite hero/talk show host of the 90s is finally available in action figure form and we couldn’t be happier. Whether the mission is saving the galaxy or in-depth interviews of your other action figures, the Space Ghost action figure is sure to rise up to the challenge.

posts.title: Thumb Sumo Wrestlers
posts.content: One, two, three, four, I declare thumb sumo wrestler war! The great American sport of thumb wrestling has now been integrated with the ancient competitive sport of sumo wrestling thanks to these rubber thumb attaching sumo wrestler bodies.

posts.title: DIY Superhero Cape Kit
posts.content: Craft your little crime fighter a cape befitting of his/her legendary status against evil doers by using this DIY superhero cape kit. It comes with everything from the cape itself, to foam sheets, glitter, and stars – so you can customize the cape in a variety of styles.

posts.title: Gourmet Rainbow Popcorn
posts.content: Make snacking the best part of your movie-going experience by digging into this gourmet rainbow popcorn. Each one-pound bag of this yummy snack includes five alluring and delicious flavors – strawberry, banana, orange, blueberry, and green apple.

posts.title: Beer Koozie Necktie
posts.content: Cradle your precious beer like a mother kangaroo cradles her young joey by wearing the beer koozie necktie. This fashionable garment helps you maintain a professional demeanor at the office or company picnic while increasing your beer carrying capacity.

posts.title: Fancy Cat Top Hat
posts.content: Give Mr. Whiskers the sophisticated look of a distinguished aristocrat with a fancy cat top hat. Each elegant top hat features a convenient head strap so the hat remains affixed and is accented with a stylish silk ribbon available in one of three vibrant colors.
